title: Five-Star Tropical Fiji Beachside Retreat on Tokoriki Island with FJ$500 Resort Credit & Daily Breakfast (Select Packages Only)
description:
Laidback luxury on Fiji’s phenomenal sands awaits with an escape to the breathtaking five-star Sheraton Resort & Spa, Tokoriki Island, Fiji. This award-winning resort offers just 36 traditional bures and villas surrounded by lush greenery, and each one offers a taste of secluded serenity while perfectly fusing modern Fijian-inspired design elements. Savour Fijian fine dining and watch swaying palm trees move with the salty sea breeze, rejuvenate and revitalise with a visit to the world-class Tokoriki Retreat Spa or take it easy and watch the day drift slowly by with a cocktail in hand. Whatever you decide, you'll be supported by the resort's traditional Fijian hospitality and top-notch attention to detail.

Surround yourself with the remarkable beauty and serenity of Fiji’s glimmering waters and swaying coconut palms ofTokoriki Island - part of the extraordinary Mamanuca archipelago, just a scenic boat ride from Nadi. Framed by lush tropical vegetation, flawless sandy stretches and warm blue waters, this beachfront oasis is the complete package of sun, sand and serenity amid two stunning beaches - perfect for couples seeking a tranquil escape.
location_description: Sheraton Resort & Spa, Tokoriki Island, Fiji
offer_address: Tokoriki Island, Mamanuca Islands, Nadi, Fiji

title: Fiji Five-Star Sheraton Escape with Decadent Dining, Massages & Nightly Drinks
description:
Surround yourself with the remarkable beauty and serenity of Fiji’s glimmering waters and swaying coconut palms at Sheraton Resort & Spa, Tokoriki Island, Fiji - part of the extraordinary Mamanuca archipelago, just a scenic boat ride from Nadi.

Framed by lush tropical vegetation, flawless sandy stretches and warm blue waters, this beachfront oasis is the complete package of sun, sand and serenity amid Fiji's stunning natural environment - perfect for couples or families seeking a tranquil escape. Hours of entertainment are ensured as you make the most of the facilities within this five-star resort, including a beachside infinity pool, private mini-golf course, world-class dining, tennis court, Kids' Club, fitness centre, day spa and more. Beyond the resort, you can venture below the surface to colourful coral reefs or island-hop to nearby beaches and villages.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day in paradise with a delicious breakfast
- Arrive to a welcome bottle of sparkling wine
- Make your escape feel extra special with three dinners for two per stay
- Enjoy a nightly glass of house wine or local beer each at one of the resort’s restaurants or bars
- Slip into relaxation with six 30-minute massages per package

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Island Family Suite and two children (12 and under) stay, play and eat free (when dining with a paying adult)! 

**Book with 100% Confidence**: If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.
location_description: Sheraton Resort & Spa, Tokoriki Island, Fiji OLD

title: Discover Contemporary Indulgence on a Striking Coral Reef
description: Barefoot luxury meets Sheraton sophistication on Tokoriki Island-part of Fiji’s pristine Mamanuca Islands, located just a 45-minute boat ride from Fiji’s main island. Find a tropical paradise just steps from the beachfront at the five-star Sheraton Resort & Spa, Tokoriki Island and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, decadent dining experiences, a nightly drink, six 30-minute massages at the lavish spa, daily use of non-motorised water sports like kayaks and paddle boards, and more.
location_description: Sheraton Resort & Spa, Tokoriki Island, Fiji OLD
